name: N.A.P.S. Prototype
description:
Think you've got what it takes to do MANUAL LABOR?

Try to sort every box where it needs to go with the least amount of errors possible,
or else your supervisors/coworkers may make (passive-)aggressive remarks!
Don't worry too much about screwing up, though: your coworkers will recycle any mis-sorts you send them, allowing you to try again!

Don't forget to use BOTH HANDS to pick up a box.

Controls:
A and D - Extend Left and Right ArmsArrow Keys - Pivot Left/Right and Lean Forward/Backward
R - Reset Game
Escape - Break the game (This quit out in the original desktop version.)

P.S. I made this prototype last year to steal my soul back from my manual labor job.
